verses.verse: In those <S%G1565><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> very <S%G3827><s%> great, <S%G3827><s%> and having <S%G2192><s%> nothing <S%G3385><s%> to eat, <S%G5315><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> called <S%G4341><s%> his disciples <S%G3101><s%> to him, and said <S%G3004><s%> to them,

I have compassion <S%G4697><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the multitude, <S%G3793><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they have now <S%G2235><s%> been <S%G4357><s%> with me three <S%G5140><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> and have <S%G2192><s%> nothing <S%G3756><s%> <S%G5100><s%> to eat: <S%G5315><s%>

And if <S%G1437><s%> I send <S%G630><s%> them away <S%G630><s%> fasting <S%G3523><s%> to their own houses, <S%G3624><s%> they will faint <S%G1590><s%> by the way: <S%G3598><s%> for divers <S%G5100><s%> of them came <S%G2240><s%> from far. <S%G3113><s%>

And his disciples <S%G3101><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him, From where <S%G4159><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> satisfy <S%G5526><s%> these <S%G5128><s%> men with bread <S%G740><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> in the wilderness? <S%G2047><s%>
And he asked <S%G1905><s%> them, How <S%G4214><s%> many <S%G4214><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> you? And they said, <S%G2036><s%> Seven. <S%G2033><s%>

And he commanded <S%G3853><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%> to sit <S%G377><s%> down <S%G377><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the ground: <S%G1093><s%> and he took <S%G2983><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> loaves, <S%G740><s%> and gave <S%G1325><s%> thanks, <S%G2168><s%> and broke, <S%G2806><s%> and gave <S%G1325><s%> to his disciples <S%G3101><s%> to set <S%G3908><s%> before <S%G3908><s%> them; and they did set <S%G3908><s%> them before <S%G3908><s%> the people. <S%G3793><s%>

And they had <S%G2192><s%> a few <S%G3641><s%> small <S%G2485><s%> fishes: <S%G2485><s%> and he blessed, <S%G2127><s%> and commanded <S%G2036><s%> to set <S%G3908><s%> them also <S%G2532><s%> before <S%G3908><s%> them.

So <S%G1161><s%> they did eat, <S%G5315><s%> and were filled: <S%G5526><s%> and they took <S%G142><s%> up of the broken <S%G2801><s%> meat that was left <S%G4051><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> baskets. <S%G4711><s%>
And they that had eaten <S%G5315><s%> were about <S%G5613><s%> four <S%G5070><s%> thousand: <S%G5070><s%> and he sent <S%G630><s%> them away. <S%G630><s%>

And straightway <S%G2112><s%> he entered <S%G1684><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a ship <S%G4143><s%> with his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the parts <S%G3313><s%> of Dalmanutha. <S%G1148><s%>

And the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> forth, <S%G1831><s%> and began <S%G756><s%> to question <S%G4802><s%> with him, seeking <S%G2212><s%> of him a sign <S%G4592><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> tempting <S%G3985><s%> him.

And he sighed <S%G389><s%> deeply <S%G389><s%> in his spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> does this <S%G3778><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%> seek <S%G1934><s%> after <S%G1934><s%> a sign? <S%G4592><s%> truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, There shall no <S%G1487><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> be given <S%G1325><s%> to this <S%G5026><s%> generation. <S%G1074><s%>
And he left <S%G863><s%> them, and entering <S%G1684><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the ship <S%G4143><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> departed <S%G565><s%> to the other <S%G4008><s%> side. <S%G4008><s%>

Now <S%G2532><s%> the disciples had forgotten <S%G1950><s%> to take <S%G2983><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3762><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> they in the ship <S%G4143><s%> with them more <S%G1508><s%> than <S%G1508><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> loaf. <S%G740><s%>

And he charged <S%G1291><s%> them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Take heed, <S%G3708><s%> beware <S%G991><s%> of the leaven <S%G2219><s%> of the Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> and of the leaven <S%G2219><s%> of Herod. <S%G2264><s%>
And they reasoned <S%G1260><s%> among <S%G4314><s%> themselves, <S%G240><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> It is because <S%G3754><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>

And when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> it, he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Why <S%G5101><s%> reason <S%G1260><s%> you, because <S%G3754><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> bread? <S%G740><s%> perceive <S%G3539><s%> you not yet, <S%G3768><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> understand? <S%G4920><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> you your <S%G5216><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> hardened? <S%G4456><s%>
Having <S%G2192><s%> eyes, <S%G3788><s%> see <S%G991><s%> you not? and having <S%G2192><s%> ears, <S%G3775><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> you not? and do you not remember? <S%G3421><s%>

When <S%G3753><s%> I broke <S%G2806><s%> the five <S%G4002><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> five <S%G4000><s%> thousand, <S%G4000><s%> how <S%G4214><s%> many <S%G4214><s%> baskets <S%G2894><s%> full <S%G4134><s%> of fragments <S%G2801><s%> took <S%G142><s%> you up? They say <S%G3004><s%> to him, Twelve. <S%G1427><s%>

And when <S%G3753><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> four <S%G5070><s%> thousand, <S%G5070><s%> how <S%G4214><s%> many <S%G4214><s%> baskets <S%G4711><s%> full <S%G4138><s%> of fragments <S%G2801><s%> took <S%G142><s%> you up? And they said, <S%G2036><s%> Seven. <S%G2033><s%>
And he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, How <S%G4459><s%> is it that you do not understand? <S%G4920><s%>
And he comes <S%G2064><s%> to Bethsaida; <S%G966><s%> and they bring <S%G5342><s%> a blind <S%G5185><s%> man to him, and sought <S%G3870><s%> him to touch <S%G680><s%> him.

And he took <S%G1949><s%> the blind <S%G5185><s%> man by the hand, <S%G5495><s%> and led <S%G1806><s%> him out of the town; <S%G2968><s%> and when he had spit <S%G4429><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> his eyes, <S%G3659><s%> and put <S%G2007><s%> his hands <S%G5495><s%> on him, he asked <S%G1905><s%> him if <S%G1487><s%> he saw <S%G991><s%> ought. <S%G5100><s%>
And he looked <S%G308><s%> up, and said, <S%G3004><s%> I see <S%G991><s%> men <S%G444><s%> as trees, <S%G1186><s%> walking. <S%G4043><s%>

After <S%G1534><s%> that he put <S%G2007><s%> his hands <S%G5495><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> on his eyes, <S%G3788><s%> and made <S%G4160><s%> him look <S%G308><s%> up: and he was restored, <S%G600><s%> and saw <S%G1689><s%> every <S%G537><s%> man clearly. <S%G5081><s%>

And he sent <S%G649><s%> him away <S%G649><s%> to his house, <S%G3624><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Neither <S%G3366><s%> go <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the town, <S%G2968><s%> nor <S%G3366><s%> tell <S%G2036><s%> it to any <S%G5100><s%> in the town. <S%G2968><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out, and his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the towns <S%G2968><s%> of Caesarea <S%G2542><s%> Philippi: <S%G5375><s%> and by the way <S%G3598><s%> he asked <S%G1905><s%> his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to them, Whom <S%G5101><s%> do men <S%G444><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> that I am? <S%G1511><s%>
And they answered, <S%G611><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptist; <S%G910><s%> but some <S%G243><s%> say, Elias; <S%G2243><s%> and others, <S%G243><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> of the prophets. <S%G4396><s%>

And he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, But whom <S%G5101><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> you that I am? <S%G1511><s%> And Peter <S%G4074><s%> answers <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, You are <S%G1488><s%> the Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
And he charged <S%G2008><s%> them that they should tell <S%G3004><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> man <S%G3367><s%> of him.

And he began <S%G756><s%> to teach <S%G1321><s%> them, that the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> suffer <S%G3958><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> things, and be rejected <S%G593><s%> of the elders, <S%G4245><s%> and of the chief <S%G749><s%> priests, <S%G749><s%> and scribes, <S%G1122><s%> and be killed, <S%G615><s%> and after <S%G3326><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> rise <S%G450><s%> again. <S%G450><s%>
And he spoke <S%G2980><s%> that saying <S%G3056><s%> openly. <S%G3954><s%> And Peter <S%G4074><s%> took <S%G4355><s%> him, and began <S%G756><s%> to rebuke <S%G2008><s%> him.

But when he had turned <S%G1994><s%> about <S%G1994><s%> and looked <S%G1492><s%> on his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> he rebuked <S%G2008><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Get <S%G5217><s%> you behind <S%G3694><s%> me, Satan: <S%G4567><s%> for you mind <S%G5426><s%> not the things that be of God, <S%G2316><s%> but the things that be of men. <S%G444><s%>

And when he had called <S%G4341><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%> to him with his disciples <S%G3101><s%> also, he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Whoever <S%G3748><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> me, let him deny <S%G533><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> and take <S%G142><s%> up his cross, <S%G4716><s%> and follow <S%G190><s%> me.

For whoever <S%G3736><s%> <S%G302><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> save <S%G4982><s%> his life <S%G5590><s%> shall lose <S%G622><s%> it; but whoever <S%G3736><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall lose <S%G622><s%> his life <S%G5590><s%> for my sake <S%G1752><s%> and the gospel's, <S%G2098><s%> the same <S%G3778><s%> shall save <S%G4982><s%> it.

For what <S%G5101><s%> shall it profit <S%G5623><s%> a man, <S%G444><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> he shall gain <S%G2770><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> and lose <S%G2210><s%> his own soul? <S%G5590><s%>
Or <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> shall a man <S%G444><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> in exchange <S%G465><s%> for his soul? <S%G5590><s%>

Whoever <S%G3736><s%> <S%G302><s%> therefore <S%G1063><s%> shall be ashamed <S%G1870><s%> of me and of my words <S%G3056><s%> in this <S%G5026><s%> adulterous <S%G3428><s%> and sinful <S%G268><s%> generation; <S%G1074><s%> of him also <S%G2532><s%> shall the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> be ashamed, <S%G1870><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> he comes <S%G2064><s%> in the glory <S%G1391><s%> of his Father <S%G3962><s%> with the holy <S%G40><s%> angels. <S%G32><s%>
